name: ghostd
text: No rude titties for Beef.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: That "Magic's Mysteries Revealed!" show is pretty good, too.

name: albatross
text: I think it's natural to want to flee a world where people would tape over porno.

name: genequagmire
text: I concur thoroughly.  Unless it was lame vivid-type porn.

name: varnish
text: It's Roast Beef's discomfort at being hugged that makes this one work. Hell of character establishing.

name: boyd
text: I figured it was because he was aroused about the porn and didn't want to rub against a fat cat in a thong.

name: mustakrakesh
text:
Yeah but who hasn't done that?


Am I right?

name: blarghamagarky
text: I really hope you are secretly Tom Waits

name: varnish
text: Life is a parade of terrible disappointments.

name: blarghamagarky
text: that is something that Tom Waits would say to be mean to me.

name: semiquaver
text: I can basically now dream that this is a rare public outing by my favorite person ever

name: spinynorman
text: Do love beautiful poems telling you terrible things?

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by korukyu, indiglow, whoper, HeyMan, farqussus, luasn, snoozebar, Lumus, ASaltySalute4, slalvation)

name: semiquaver
text: You must realize that you have called "panels" "strips."  The things that are boxes are called "panels."  This is not a mistake that you will ever make again.

name: tekende
text: That's the main problem you have with a comment that stated that this strip makes the commentor need to use the toilet?

name: petro
text: Magicians' assistants have rude titties, sometimes.

name: tetrisattack
text: That's how my parents get my crazy Grandfather to come home for Christmas.

name: tekende
text: Grandpa! Wait! Nooo!

name: gompo
text: Ray is such a dick for not even bothering to back up his lie even a little bit.

name: songbirdspectre
text: that hug. it hurts me inside.

name: javonathan
text:
Roast Beef spoke about the porno as if it were a drug deal or some other such business transaction.

"...there is the small matter of the materials we discussed?"

name: dougthehead
text: I think Ray has had to say "Nooooooo!!!" to a rapidly retreating Roast Beef more than he has to any other character.

name: foxtrotamend
text: That was cruel.  You can't promise Ruuude Titties and then fail to deliver.

name: zem
text: it turns out that ray was the rude titties

name: filossoapeyed
text: The 24  hours it takes to travel from the moon to earth is certainly enough time to make a quickie run to the back room of a video store. Ray clearly didn't try hard enough.

name: shrewbie
text: You don't get the RUDEST from a video store

name: gussiejives
text: HUUUUGS!

name: charchar
text: I don't want a hug! Stop! I'll wound you!

name: i_love_kate
text: Charchar will gut you from crotch to sternum like a rainbow trout if you give her a look askance.

name: donnatron
text: It is not cool to joke about rude titties.

name: miaou
text: Yeah I mean, it's rude .

name: mikeronomicon
text: I would harm someone for tempting me with rude titties and then taping over them. Bastards.

name: sweetlips
text: Man, Roast Beef would totally accept Ray's hug.

name: kalethan
text: ^obviously he would accept no such thing

name: cpnglxynchos
text: (this is a blatant lie)
